summary.description:
Potential molecular mechanism of ACE gene at different time points in STEMI patients based on genome-wide microarray dataset.

NCBI's Gene Expression Omnibus (GEO) is a public archive and resource for gene expression data.

GEO help: Mouse over screen elements for information.

Scope: Self Platform Samples Series Family Format: HTML SOFT MINiML Amount: Brief Quick GEO accession:.

||| NAME (GSE59867) SIMILAR TO (PUB. DIFFERENT) bio.tools/GSE33335 (GSE33335), bio.tools/GSE56348 (GSE56348), bio.tools/GSE117578 (GSE117578), bio.tools/gse (GSE).

||| CORRECT NAME OF TOOL COULD ALSO BE 'STEMI', 'admission', 'ACE' (bio.tools/ace_insect; bio.tools/ace), 'discharge'
summary.name: GSE59867
